title: Unpublished Copy of The Libertarian Dictator
description: In the not so distant future the DEA Expansion Act forces all employers with more than ten employees to randomly drug test all employees. Anyone who fails a drug test cannot be employed for five years or it is a $10,000 fine per employee, per day.‘No sober person should be out of work when there are drug users with jobs. Cut off the money and this ends the supply; this is how we win the drug war.’Keeping you safe all day, your friendly neighborhood DEA!The Libertarian Dictator is a science fiction novel that illustrates the reasons why keeping a limited government is required to live in a free society.If you believe marijuana should remain illegal, the Patriot Act is ok because it keeps us safe or that Dick Cheney is a great American then you may not enjoy this book.
